meanings.definition: The quality or state of being woolly.
meanings.sent1: The wooliness of the sweater made it cozy and warm.
meanings.sent2: I love the wooliness of sheep's wool against my skin.
meanings.sent3: The sheep giggled at the wooliness of their own coats.
meanings.sent4: The wooliness of the clouds reminded me of a soft blanket in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The wooliness of the teddy bear was comforting to the child.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a texture similar to wool.
meanings.sent1: The fabric's wooliness made it perfect for winter wear.
meanings.sent2: I prefer the wooliness of natural wool over synthetic fibers.
meanings.sent3: The wooliness of the carpet made it feel like walking on clouds.
meanings.sent4: Her hair had a wooliness to it that reminded me of fluffy sheep.
meanings.sent5: The wooliness of the blanket provided a sense of warmth and comfort.

meanings.definition: The appearance or feel of being covered in wool.
meanings.sent1: The sheep's wooliness gave them a fluffy and adorable look.
meanings.sent2: The wooliness of the coat made it perfect for chilly evenings.
meanings.sent3: The wooliness of the clouds made them look like giant cotton balls.
meanings.sent4: The wooliness of the hat kept my head warm in the snow.
meanings.sent5: The wooliness of the scarf felt soft and luxurious around my neck.
